entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
